summary: A Couple of Goofs in a Single Bed
body:
A Couple of Goofs in a Single Bed

Rating: G

Word Count: 1.6k

Summary: Dan’s tiny bed in his tiny brown bedroom can barely contain the two of them. Dan’s curled up into Phil, both for the sappy reason that they cannot help but tangle together while they have the chance, and the practical reason that Dan’s tiny bed wouldn’t allow for anything else.

A fic about laughter and close quarters.

read on ao3

summary: wait yeah why would ppl sell their left lung to hear phil say shit or whatever like hoe..... its not that big of a deal besides...
question: wait yeah why would ppl sell their left lung to hear phil say shit or whatever like hoe..... its not that big of a deal besides if he wants to keep his channel pg then let him i dont see why phil "rebranding" automatically means curse words
answer:
lol I’m with you on the that ☺️ (though i don’t think he ever said that he was “rebranding”?)

I never got the fuss, definitely don’t care if he curses or not. I guess people take it as a sign of him moving to more “mature” content, but I don’t see the correlation tbh

summary: Part of the reason I think Phil's fine w/doing this same type of content & not necessarily trying to figure out next steps is...
question: Part of the reason I think Phil's fine w/doing this same type of content & not necessarily trying to figure out next steps is how in the Mukbang while Dan was saying he wanted to change things up Phil said in contrast that he was quite easygoing w/ his channel. For me a new setting, switching lions to corgis + using 'adult' words doesn't make up for recycled content. If his strategy is to use filler for now to keep interest it's unfortunately having the opposite effect on me.
answer:
Sorry I took forever answering! I wasn’t ignoring you, I was just really busy :)

That’s valid anon, and on some level I agree with you. His content is the same basically, changing the aesthetics and language a bit doesn’t make it different (that’s part of the reason why I never understood the obsession with Phil swearing, like what difference does it make?)

But honestly I disagree with the use of the word “recycled” . It’s just his style, you can like or not, it’s up to you, but the ideas (mostly) are not reused- yes, they are right up his alley, but that’s just part of who he is on YouTube :). He’s mostly consistent with the type of things he makes. So that part didn’t bother me :) I’m not looking for some big change, I like his channel, I like his content. I do, however, feel like a few of these videos were strangely executed (almost in a rush I would say) and that’s part of why i, personally, felt like I liked them less (I loved the weakest link one and the conversation with his younger self a lot).

But I think a lot of people might feel like you do, and that’s part of why he’s not doing as well as usual (that and most definitely the lack of Dan content, it is what it is)

That’s valid anon, and on some level I agree with you. His content is the same basically, changing the aesthetics and language a bit doesn’t make it different (that’s part of the reason why I never understood the obsession with Phil swearing, like what difference does it make?)

But honestly I disagree with the use of the word “recycled” . It’s just his style, you can like or not, it’s up to you, but the ideas (mostly) are not reused- yes, they are right up his alley, but that’s just part of who he is on YouTube :). He’s mostly consistent with the type of things he makes. So that part didn’t bother me :) I’m not looking for some big change, I like his channel, I like his content. I do, however, feel like a few of these videos were strangely executed (almost in a rush I would say) and that’s part of why i, personally, felt like I liked them less (I loved the weakest link one and the conversation with his younger self a lot).

But I think a lot of people might feel like you do, and that’s part of why he’s not doing as well as usual (that and most definitely the lack of Dan content, it is what it is)
trail.content:
Sorry I took forever answering! I wasn’t ignoring you, I was just really busy :)

That’s valid anon, and on some level I agree with you. His content is the same basically, changing the aesthetics and language a bit doesn’t make it different (that’s part of the reason why I never understood the obsession with Phil swearing, like what difference does it make?)

But honestly I disagree with the use of the word “recycled” . It’s just his style, you can like or not, it’s up to you, but the ideas (mostly) are not reused- yes, they are right up his alley, but that’s just part of who he is on YouTube :). He’s mostly consistent with the type of things he makes. So that part didn’t bother me :) I’m not looking for some big change, I like his channel, I like his content. I do, however, feel like a few of these videos were strangely executed (almost in a rush I would say) and that’s part of why i, personally, felt like I liked them less (I loved the weakest link one and the conversation with his younger self a lot).

But I think a lot of people might feel like you do, and that’s part of why he’s not doing as well as usual (that and most definitely the lack of Dan content, it is what it is)

tags: these Emotions™ brought to you by Rose Is Watching The Mukbang At Work
i know i've been quiet about Things but like. this is it.
summary: i hope dan is reaping the benefits of not having to perform his life for anyone. i hope his mind feels calm and that he’s...
body: i hope dan is reaping the benefits of not having to perform his life for anyone. i hope his mind feels calm and that he’s sleeping well at night. i hope he’s finding value in time and solace and the sparse company he keeps. i hope he feels strong in the ways that matter to him. i hope he sees the road ahead of him as wide enough to be exciting and narrow enough to be comforting. i hope he finds what he’s looking for and that the journey has enriched him instead of jading him.

blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Ooh you know what kind of approach I wish Phil would have to his content? Kind of like "light entertainment for adults who need...
question: Ooh you know what kind of approach I wish Phil would have to his content? Kind of like "light entertainment for adults who need a break from their everyday lives". A lot of the teens who watched him for the validation to be a bit weird are all grown up and have jobs, girlfriends and boyfriends now. I'm sure some are even married with kids. We grew up and if he wants to keep us around him and his content has to do that too.
answer: I do think that’s the sort of shift he’s making. He seems to be catching on to the fact that his audience is primarily older teens and young adults, rather than young teens and actual children like it was several years ago. So if he wants to drop a swear word or talk about sex, he can do so knowing that he’s saying those things to an age-appropriate audience.

summary: wow, haven't been on here for a loOOng time! honestly as i grew up i became more of a casual fan, i used to check phil's insta...
question: wow, haven't been on here for a loOOng time! honestly as i grew up i became more of a casual fan, i used to check phil's insta stories n stuff a few months ago but i rarely do so anymore. i watch if a new vid is uploaded but i dont wait for the notif to come, i watch it if i have time and wanna relax a lil. i don't think i would compeletely move on from them tho, but definitely not as fangirl as i used to be. (which i'm kinda proud of lmaoo) 1/2
answer:
“and i do kinda understand d’s silence and him not wanting to be a youtuber anymore. it might get boring after some time. that’s why you gotta make good career choices kids! !! (do the thing you love tho im jus kidding here) 2/2”

…

If there’s one good thing coming from this hiatus it’s that most of the crazier phannies are moving on to greener pastures. Some crazies remain, but for the most part the Phandom seems to consist of casual viewers who just pop in from time to time, and long-time viewers who can’t let go just yet.

summary: the good ol days were when they worked at the radio station, there was a different feeling in the phandom, so much diverse...
question: the good ol days were when they worked at the radio station, there was a different feeling in the phandom, so much diverse entertaining content
answer:
2014 was quite a year. Dan and Phil were both still doing solo videos, the occasional collab with each other or other youtubers, they had the radio show, the gaming channel was just starting out, they were doing weekly live shows, there was just a lot of cool shit to look forward to every week.

Flash forward 5 years later and the most exciting thing we get in a week is a Phil video and maybe Dan posts a tweet from his drafts.

How times have changed.
